title: [Health] Exposure to phthalates—a group of chemicals found in everything from plastics to personal care products—may disrupt an important hormone needed to sustain a healthy pregnancy. Levels were strongest in women who developed pregnancy complications like gestational diabetes and high blood pressure.

[Medicine] UCI-led research team discovers a molecular feature in prostate cancer with prognostic value, distinguishes ancestral differences | Expression signatures may be useful for assessing greatest risk of progression in prostate and other cancers
